config_descriptions.web_ide_debug_mode: Enable Debug Mode in Web IDE (Bottle Debug mode)
config_descriptions.disable_device_sleep: Prevent your iPhone/iPad/iPod from sleeping while running WebIDE
config_descriptions.enable_run: Enable "Run" from WebIDE - Run the script you are working on in Pythonista.
config_descriptions.run_export_globals: Return a list of globals initialized by apps you run with Run feature.
config_descriptions.run_export_globals_internals: Include internals like __builtins__ with the export globals report.
